title: Assembling Bliss Dance!
author: Affinity
content:
What an amazing afternoon we had yesterday, I love my community.  My friends and I went to watch the test run for assembling Bliss Dance, a forty foot female who is headed for [BM].  It was so exciting to see her arm attached, from the inside out.  I don’t know exactly where she will be on the Playa, but I bet she will be hard to miss.  So stop by and see her, she is waiting to dance with YOU!

photos: Keith Gardner
